Assumptions: Data for cement manufacturing in China indicated 58% typical Clinker-to-Cement ratio and assuming a zero Cement Kiln Dusts adjustment factor gives the ratio of 21.55% C emission to ton clinker based on molar mass balance of calcination equation.
